message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $18,000. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit outside my budget. I'm interested in the product, but  $8,000 is closer to what I had in mind.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway at $12,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a little closer. How about we settle at $10,000 even? That's my final offer.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10,000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $11,000. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
